comments.en:
Known not to use a standard protocol as PostScript or PCL; not to be confused with the EPL-6100.

Dr H. T. Leung and Roberto Ragusa have developed a driver; based on reverse-engineering of the printer's protocol.

The printer has parallel and USB connectors.

This printer probably works with this driver but was not fully tested yet. Any test report is welcome.

Consumables/Refills: Separate photoconductor drum and toner cartridge
